amendment.description: To require the Secretary of Transportation to transmit to Congress a report on any actions that should be taken with respect to recommendations made by the National Commission to Ensure Consumer Information and Choice in the Airline Industry on travel agents.

vote.text: Amendment SA 899 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 899 proposed by Senator Burns. (consideration: CR S7811; text: CR S7811) To require the Secretary of Transportation to transmit to Congress a report on any actions that should be taken with respect to recommendations made by the National Commission to Ensure Consumer Information and Choice in the Airline Industry on travel agents.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 899 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 899 proposed by Senator Burns.
